name: Introduction to Computer Science
description: A course introducing basic computer science concepts such as data structures and algorithms, as well as programming fundamentals in a high-level language.

name: Computer Organization and Architecture
description: A course introducing the fundamentals of computer architecture and hardware organization, including topics such as memory and instruction set architectures.

name: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: A course introducing data structures and algorithms, including topics such as sorting, searching, and recursion.

name: Operating Systems
description: A course introducing the fundamentals of operating systems, including topics such as scheduling, memory management, and synchronization.

name: Programming Languages
description: A course introducing the fundamentals of programming languages, including topics such as syntax, semantics, and types.

name: Computer Networks
description: A course introducing the fundamentals of computer networks, including topics such as protocols and architecture.

name: Artificial Intelligence
description: A course introducing the fundamentals of artificial intelligence, including topics such as search algorithms, game playing, and natural language processing.
